page.title: 01Western Southampton
page.content: This Domesday Block covers the north-west area of the city of{ {Southampton,}as well as the western outskirts of the city. The local areas within the D-Block are called{Nursling, Lord's Hill, Old {Shirley, Maybush, Aldermoor, Lord's {Wood, Shirley Warren}. The western half of the D-Block is mainly rural. The{M271}cuts through to join the {M27}which goes west/east. The{River Test}flows through marshes. There is a new Industrial Estate, some farming and woodland. A railway line runs from Southampton Docks. The eastern half of the D-Block is residential and commercial. At {Lord's {Hill}and{Aldermoor}are large council estates. There is a General Hospital and the Ordnance Survey headquarters. There are small areas of woodland left at{Lord's Wood}.
